thread.title: Martellus Bennett sends out inspirational tweets
thread.title_full: Martellus Bennett sends out inspirational tweets

author: USA TODAY
title: Martellus Bennett sends out inspirational tweets
text:
Martellus Bennett sends out inspirational tweets "This is important. I'm important. You're important." Post to Facebook Martellus Bennett sends out inspirational tweets "This is important. I'm important. You're important."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/martellus-bennett-patriots-twitter-inspire-kids-mind-woke-important-super-bowl-champ/   Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Martellus Bennett sends out inspirational tweets Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 7:14 p.m. ET Feb. 7, 2017 
New England Patriots' Martellus Bennett appears at a news conference with his daughter Austyn Jett Rose Bennett after the NFL Super Bowl 51 football game Sunday, Feb. 5, 2017, in Houston. The New England Patriots won 34-28 in overtime. (Photo: AP) 
Patriots tight end Martellus Bennett has been known to speak his mind, whether that be on Twitter or to the media (through words or actions ). And he has made it clear that his family and inspiring other kids through his Imagination Agency is important to him. 
After the Patriots' Super Bowl parade , Bennett took to Twitter to share some thoughts and wisdom. Here it is in full, and in chronological order - from why he speaks out the way he does to about how he and his daughter build rocket ships out of society's "boxes": Don't get mad because I found what they thought they could hide in books. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I was a black man yesterday and I'm going to be a black man tomorrow. My wife and daughter are women today and will be women tomorrow. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I don't come on the internet to build my self esteem nor will what strangers think ever bother me. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I'm that black boy. That black boy is me. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 He mentions his book and his app. Buy my children's book. It's lead character is also black like my daughter. Only 3% of children's books have characters of color. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 3%. Think about that â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 My interactive children's book app is free. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 Hey AJ! It's Saturday by Imagination Agency Free Download. https://t.co/yH1bslDU6r â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 Then, he goes on to explain how he's so much more than just a professional football player. I've found Gold. Fruit. Joy. Success. Happiness and I'm going to build a bridge so that my friends can do the same. This is a metaphor â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I have two libraries in my house thousands of books. I love to read because I know that for a long time ancestors weren't allowed to. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I love to write. Because for a lo gg time my people weren't "allowed" to. So I'm going to write my books, my apps and tell my stories â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I'm going to speak my mind because guess what... that's right for a looonngg time my ancestors didn't have a voice. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 When you look at me what do you see? I know you wanna ask me what sport I play. I mean what else could I possibly be besides an athlete. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 When you look at me see the father, the awesome dad, the author, film director, business owner, champion, friend, Hufflepuff beast. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 Why he won't "Stick to sports" and wants to inspire kids: Shut up and stick to sports!! Enjoy the low hanging fruits Marty. Don't climb to the top of the Apple tree and taste that high hanging fruit â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 This is part of the reason why I'm working to build Art Centers and Computer Labs for kids to learn coding. I'm not building gyms â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I'm not interested in building football fields or doing football camps. I'm interested in doing film camps and coding camps. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 He wants kids to know they don't have to be a pro athlete or a rapper to be successful. You don't have to be good at sports young man. Go upstairs and finish practicing that trombone. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 You don't have to rap. You can score films. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 You don't have to dunk. You can crossover and own the basketball team. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 "They can't tear down your mind." The first thing they tear down are the basketball goals. They can't tear down your mind. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 See when develop a vision they try to distract your vision with glittery things. Don't get distracted. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 Your favorite athlete stands on his platform to be seen. I stand on my platform to shout. To be heard. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 They can't steal your joy when it comes from above. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 I'm over the low hanging fruit. I'm at the top of the tree tossing down the really good fruit. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 This is important. I'm important. You're important. We're important. They're important. That's important. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 It's all good though. I will not get inside the box society provides for everyone at birth. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 BUILD ROCKET SHIPS OUT OF THE SOCIETY'S BOXES. And the box society sent for my daughter at birth we built a rocket ship out of it. Bennett notes he is a goofy dude , but he's more than just that. Y'all thought I was just a goofy dude here to make you laugh. Well that's partially true I do enjoy that. ðŸ˜‚ But it's bigger than that. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 After more than an hour of tweets, he wraps it up. Stay woke. â€” Martellus Bennett (@MartysaurusRex) February 7, 2017 
Keep being awesome, Martellus Bennett. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/martellus-bennett-patriots-twitter-inspire-kids-mind-woke-important-super-bowl-champ/ Most Popular
